title.value: UK Core Pathology And Laboratory Medicine Observables

description.value:
A set of codes regarding laboratory medicine test results intended for use by pathology services and their users. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system:
- memberOf 1853551000000106 | Pathology and laboratory medicine observable entity simple reference set |
- memberOf 999002881000000100 | Pathology Bounded Code List observables simple reference set |
